name: Kisha Poppo Japanese Restaurant
address: 11660 Steveston Hwy #1060, Richmond, BC V7A 1N6, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Box (A)
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken teriyaki, gyoza, tempura, California rolls, tuna and salmon sushi.

hasMenuItem.name: California Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Classic blend of crab, avocado, and cucumber wrapped in seaweed and rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Gyoza (Pork & Veggies)
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried dumplings filled with a mixture of pork and vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Dynamite Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Prawn tempura, avocado, and cucumber, typically wrapped in sushi rice and nori, often accompanied by spicy mayo and tobiko.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Teriyaki Don
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken glazed in teriyaki sauce, typically includes onions and a soft-boiled egg, served over a bed of rice.

hasMenuItem.description: Sliced yam and creamy avocado, wrapped in sushi rice and seaweed.

hasMenuItem.description: 10 pieces of Atlantic salmon sashimi. Available in half or full order sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: Prawn Gyoza

hasMenuItem.name: Agedashi Tofu
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy fried tofu cubes in a dashi-based sauce

hasMenuItem.description: Boiled young soybeans, typically lightly seasoned with sea salt.

hasMenuItem.name: Appetizer Tempura
hasMenuItem.description: Battered and deep-fried shrimp and vegetables, served with a side of tempura dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Appetizer Sashimi
hasMenuItem.description: Assorted slices of fresh raw fish, typically including a variety of seafood selections.

hasMenuItem.name: Ika Karaage
hasMenuItem.description: Squid pieces battered and deep-fried, typically served with a tangy dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Karaage
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy Japanese-style fried chicken with a tender inside

hasMenuItem.name: Salmon Karaage
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated salmon pieces, deep-fried in a light batter, typically served with a tangy dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggies Korokke
hasMenuItem.description: Mashed potatoes and assorted vegetables formed into patties, coated in panko breadcrumbs, and deep-fried, typically served with katsu sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Haru Maki / Veggies Spring Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy Japanese spring rolls, filled with a mix of vegetables, typically served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken or Beef Teriyaki
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken or beef, glazed in rich teriyaki sauce. Served as a starter.

hasMenuItem.name: Hiyayakko (Cold Tofu)
hasMenuItem.description: Cold silken tofu typically includes a garnish of green onions and bonito flakes, served with a light soy-based sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Tai (Red Snapper)

review.reviewBody: everything fresh and done to perfection!
We enjoyed all of the food! The portions were generous, and we especially liked the Chicken Karaage and the Chicken or Beef Teriyaki Roll

The food over all didnt taste fresh.  The food that was cooked was overcooked.  They also gave us a wrong sushi roll.  I've been to their restaurant and enjoyed my food but this food delivery was bad.
Always order from here, tastes great!
